question.question: Which of the following is a characteristic feature of a chalazion?
question.option_a: It is typically painful and tender to touch.
question.option_b: It is usually caused by a bacterial infection.
question.option_c: It is a chronic, painless lump on the eyelid.
question.option_d: It is primarily found in the inner canthus of the eye.
